name: Reel Black Studios
description: A Black-owned, creative animation studio run by husband and wife duo Dara King and Chris Fequiere. They are known for the short film "Burning Rubber" and other animations

name: BWA Studios
description: An animation house that creates and produces programming and content for all platforms. It is a Black female-owned studio focused on building equity in the animation industry by consciously recruiting Black women, women of color, and nonbinary people of color

name: Austin Visuals
description: A 3D animation studio in Texas with over ten years of experience, known for delivering amazing results within budget and timeline. They offer a wide range of services including 2D and 3D animations, VR/AR solutions, and live video production

name: Powerhouse Animation Studios
description: Based in Austin, this studio has worked on projects like Netflix's "Castlevania" and is known for its expertise in both entertainment and commercial animation

name: Prolific Studio
description: A leading animation company with studios in multiple locations, specializing in 2D and 3D animations, including game trailers, logo animations, and explainer videos. They focus on delivering high-quality, customized animations for brands

name: Motion Giraffx
description: Based in Houston, this studio offers 3D animations, motion graphics, and dynamic visuals, providing a full set of services from concept to final production

name: Wienot Films
description: A video production company specializing in animated explainer videos and motion graphics, known for quality and professionalism

name: Janimation
description: A full-service animation and anime studio offering live-action, visual effects (VFX), virtual reality (VR), and motion graphics for various industries

name: Cloud Animations
description: A leading animation studio in Austin known for its innovative approach, using cutting-edge technology and expertise to deliver visually compelling animations

name: Pixeldust Studios
description: A leading animation and TV production company with a diverse range of clients, known for delivering high-quality, visually striking, engaging, and impactful work
